short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A weekly stash of http links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkstash.net is a short-term bookmarking service. 
Everyday, as you browse the web, you stumble on pages you'd like to read later and quickly your bookmarks folder becomes cluttered and you don't know where to start from.
After having created a stash on Linkstash.net, rather than bookmarking a page you want to read later, send the page URL to your stash using Linkstash Chrome. URLs in your stash are stored for a week then expire, keeping your stash clean and you focused.
